title: Where are my contacts?
creator: KuriousG
content: I recently upgraded to a Pixel 9a from a Pixel 8a. If I want to forward or create a new email message I cannot type a name in the To: area my contact list doesn't exist or display any of my contacts. What do I need to do to get access to my contacts?

title: Colors/Links in Android Thunderbird
